definition: to punch or bore a hole/to perforate/perforation
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

sentences.english: The risks of self-piercing are high so it is always best to visit a professional piercer .
sentences.chinese: 風險自衝高，所以它始終是最好的訪問專業穿孔。

sentences.english: The article studied the geometrical dimensions and surface quality of the shells in the deformation zone of piercing.
sentences.chinese: 研究了穿孔變形區中毛管的幾何尺寸和表面質量。

sentences.english: The most common cause of perforation is otitis media .
sentences.chinese: 最常見的原因是穿孔性中耳炎。

sentences.english: Sigmoid and transverse colon was the common site of perforation.
sentences.chinese: 穿孔部位常見於乙狀結腸和橫結腸。

sentences.english: In rare cases, the intestine perforates and the infant dies.
sentences.chinese: 極少數的個案，出現腸道出現穿孔而導致死亡。

sentences.english: I highly recommend laminating your perforated film with a premium optically clear film laminate.
sentences.chinese: 我強烈建議將穿孔貼膜用優質光學層壓制件捲成薄片。

sentences.english: This study suggests that the permeability of yeast cells can be increased by square-wave electroporation.
sentences.chinese: 這表明電穿孔法可以有效增強酵母菌細胞的通透性。

sentences.english: Electroporation takes 3–4 seconds and the sensation is similar to a punch in the arm.
sentences.chinese: 電穿孔需要3到4秒，而且感覺與在手臂上打針類似。

sentences.english: What can pierce ones ears without a hole?
sentences.chinese: 什麼東西不用打洞就可以在耳朵上穿孔？

sentences.english: During surgery, a rectal perforation was found to have caused the air leak.
sentences.chinese: 經手術後發現直腸穿孔爲氣腫的原因。

sentences.english: Rhodium-plated pierced earrings with bezel-set clear crystals in various cuts.
sentences.chinese: 鍍白金色穿孔耳環配以不同形狀的包邊鑲嵌透明水晶。

sentences.english: I followed instructions from cards with holes.
The characteristic of an electroporation apparatus for transdermal drug delivery is discussed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了一種經皮給藥電穿孔儀的性能。

sentences.english: Conclusions: Biologic protein sponge is effective material mending the perforation of eardrum.
sentences.chinese: 結論生物蛋白海綿可促進鼓膜穿孔修復和癒合。

sentences.english: Dragon of puncturing mud robot is a kind of device that can go ahead and extrude hole in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 穿地龍機器人是一種可在土中擠壓穿孔前進的裝置。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the surgical treatment for perforation of gastric tumour.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃腫瘤性穿孔的外科治療方法。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
